utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hey everybody! Happy Thanksgiving!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: No, no, no. No-no-no.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: What, are we keeping Thanksgiving a secret this year?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: No, we're playing this game I learned at work. You have to name all the states in six minutes.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: What? That's like insanely easy!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Now, that's a lot harder than it sounds. You always forget at least one, or in some cases... fourteen .

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: It's a stupid game and I wasn't playing against other people, so technically I didn't lose.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: What? You forgot fourteen states?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Nobody cares about the Dakotas.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh, okay, time's up!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: All right, I got 48.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh that's not bad, Pheebs?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh, I got tired of naming states. So I decided to list the types of celery, and I have one: regular celery.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Okay, so Rachel's got 48 and Phoebe has the lead in…vegetables, Joey?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Say hello to the new champ of Chandler's dumb states game.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Wow, how many have you got?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Fifty-six!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey! How is New England not a state? Huh? They have a sports-team!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Does South Oregon have a sports-team? There you go.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: How come we have one extra place setting?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: 'Cause you invited your assistant.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh, right. Sorry. But Tag's not coming; his girlfriend came into town, so he's spending Thanksgiving with her.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh! Why didn't you tell me? I made him his own individual sweet potato stuffed pumpkin.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Well, I was going to, but then I figured, you know... you're food is so delicious and perfect, you can never have too many of those pumpkin things.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Now you think I wouldn't enjoy that, because it is so fake, but I still do.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Regular Celery! Oh, I already have that.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Done! With time a-to-spare.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oooh that may be a New World's record

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: You know, I hate to lecture you guys, but it's kinda disgraceful, that a group of well-educated adults and Joey can't name all the states. Did you ever see a map, or one of those round, colorful things called "a globe?" Hmm?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Uh, Magellan? You got 46 states.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: What? That's impossible.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: 46. Wow! Who's well educated now, Mr. I-forgot-ten-states?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: All right, I'm out of oven space. I'm gonna turn on Joey's. Please, watch him! Do not let Joey eat any of the food!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I am only one man! Okay Ross, time is up!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: No, just give me another minute.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Look Ross, if you don't know them by now, you will never know them, okay? That is the beauty of this game. It makes you want to kill yourself.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: This-this is crazy! I can do this! All right, uhh, I bet I can get all 50 before dinner.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Okay, but if you can't…no dinner!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: You're on!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: All right. Don't look at my list, Ross, 'cause there's a lot on there that you don't have.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Hey, did you guys know, that your oven doesn't work?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: But the drawer full of take-out menus is okay, right?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Ross, I'm gonna use yours, okay?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Pshhshhh!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Chandler? Can you give me a hand?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Sure, and Joey; do not let Ross look at any of the maps or the globe in your apartment.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Don't worry, Chandler, it's not a globe of the United States.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Hey you guys I'm gonna go out and take a walk.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Phoebe, why is your bag moving?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh, it's not!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Seriously, it's moving!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: What the hell is in there?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: It's just my knitting that's all! Yes! I knit this. I'm very good.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Ross’s apartment is nice! How come we don't hang out here more often?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I don't know. Maybe it's because it smells a little weird. It's like old pumpkins or something.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: That's my pie!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Which smells delicious!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Uh-oh! Uh-oh!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: What?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: We left Joey alone with the food! Yep! Yep, I knew it! There he is... feeding stuffing to a dog!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Hi Geller-Bing residence. How can I help?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Phoebe, why is there a dog in our apartment?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: I'm sorry, who's this?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Phoebe, there's a dog sitting on my couch!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Tell her, I'm allergic, and I will sue!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: No, there's no dog here?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh my god! Where are you?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I'll be right there!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: They're here already? How are they doing this?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Hi Tag! What are you doing here?

utterance.speaker: Tag
utterance.content: I, uh, wanted to see if your offer to spend Thanksgiving with you is still good.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Well, sure! Come in! Well, what-what happened to your girlfriend?

utterance.speaker: Tag
utterance.content: We kinda broke up this morning.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh, I'm sorry.

utterance.speaker: Tag
utterance.content: Yeah, so she went back to Ohio.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Ohio!! Thank you!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Huh! Where is the dog?!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: What dog? There-there's no dog here.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah that dog left!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Phoebe! Phoebe, open up!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: There's no dog in here.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Phoebe, we can hear the dog barking!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: No that's just me coughing! Oh, good, there you are! Listen, um, I have a dog in my room.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: What is it doing here?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Well, I'm watching it for some friends who went out of town. Wait. Hello, my name is Clunkers. May I please stay with you nice people?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oooh, I wish she could stay here, but Chandler is allergic!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Extremely allergic, okay? If I'm anywhere near a dog for more than 5 minutes, my throat will just close up!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: That's odd, 'cause this dog's been living here for the past 3 days

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Really?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Chandler, if that dog's been here that long, and you haven't had a reaction, maybe you're not allergic to this dog?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Well, it still has to go, right?

utterance.speaker: Monica and Phoebe
utterance.content: Why?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Okay, it's um…

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Don't do it!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Don't do what?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I have to! Okay? It's time! Okay, I hate dogs.

utterance.speaker: All
utterance.content: What?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Are you crazy?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Are you out of your mind?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Why?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Told ya.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: They are needy, they are jumpy, and you can't tell what they are thinking, and that scares me a little bit.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Right, they are scary. Ahh, she just ate a treat out of my hand!!!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Wait a minute. Do you not like all dogs? I mean, not even puppies?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Is there a puppy here?

utterance.speaker: Tag
utterance.content: You don't like puppies?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Okay, you are new!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Look, Chandler, I told you, never tell anyone about this dog thing. It's like Ross not likin’ ice cream.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: You don't like ice cream?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: It's too cold.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Okay, it's just that dogs make me a little uncomfortable.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: It hurts my teeth.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: And I don't wanna say this, I don't you guys to hate me, but uh, I don't think, I can be around that dog anymore. Okay, so either the dog goes, or I go. Oh my god!!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: How can I not get this? I'm a college professor; I got 1450 on my S.A.T.s.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Damn, I forgot you were here.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: All right. We're gonna take Clunkers to Ross’s. We'll be back in a minute.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh, wait before you guys go, can I just ask you a question?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Yeah.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: When a guy breaks up with his girlfriend, what is an appropriate amount of time to wait before you make a move?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh, I'd say about a month.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Really? I'd say 3 to 4.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Half hour.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Interesting.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: When it's your assistant, I would say never.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: All right, Rach, the big question is, does he like you? All right? Because if he doesn't like you, this is all a moo-point.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Huh. A moo-point?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah, it's like a cow's opinion. It just doesn't matter. It's moo.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Have I been living with him for too long, or did that all just make sense?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Please, don't listen to Joey, okay. Would you look at him? He-he’s obviously depressed. He's away from his family; he's spending Thanksgiving with strangers. What he needs right now is for you to be his friend.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: You're right, I'm sorry. Thank you. Okay, that's what I'm gonna do.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Fine! Take their advice. No one ever listens to me. When the package is this pretty, no one cares what's inside.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Tag
utterance.content: Hey.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: How are you holding up?

utterance.speaker: Tag
utterance.content: Not bad.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yeah? I'm sorry about your girlfriend.

utterance.speaker: Tag
utterance.content: Thanks.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: So were you guys together a long time?

utterance.speaker: Tag
utterance.content: A year. On and off. I kinda thought we'd end up together. I don't anymore.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Now that she broke up with you?

utterance.speaker: Tag
utterance.content: Yeah.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yeah. Hmmmm.

utterance.speaker: Tag
utterance.content: It's weird. I always used to assume, that I would meet someone and fall in love and be happy and all that was just a given. But lately it's like what if it's not. Do you ever have that feeling?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: No…Yeah, all the time, constantly. It's terrifying. But you know that I figure it…it has to work out.

utterance.speaker: Tag
utterance.content: Why?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Because, uh—it has to.

utterance.speaker: Tag
utterance.content: You have all the answers, don't you?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yeah, I know, I do. I really do.

utterance.speaker: Tag
utterance.content: Hey, thanks for talking to me.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Well, what is a boss for? Hug it out!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: All right, he likes you back! Huh? Told ya, you should go for it!

utterance.speaker: Tag
utterance.content: What?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Street noise drowned any of that out? No, all right, I see you later, okay...

utterance.speaker: Tag
utterance.content: What did Joey say? I like you back?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Uh, yeah, well, see, he… Joey knows, that I'm-I'm very insecure about my back and, and…you're hugging me, so obviously you are not repulsed by it, yeah!

utterance.speaker: Tag
utterance.content: Wait-wait a minute; that doesn't make any sense.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: No? All right, here's the truth um, Joey said what he said, because um, I'm attracted to you.

utterance.speaker: Tag
utterance.content: Wow.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yeah, I admit it. I have a crush on you, and uh, and, and I know that's crazy because we work together, and-and nothing could ever happen, and the last thing I want to do is-is to freak you out or make you feel uncomfortable. Which is why it would be really great if you said something right about now.

utterance.speaker: Tag
utterance.content: Oh my god! Those guys are stealing my car!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: What?

utterance.speaker: Tag
utterance.content: Right there! That's my car! Hey!!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Okay, that's gonna take them a minute. Do you have anything else you wanna get off your chest?

utterance.speaker: Tag
utterance.content: I can't believe this!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Wait, we still have time to talk and they’re-they're not even in the car yet! Oh look, there they go, okay.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Okay Phoebe, we should probably go back now.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Please don't leave me, I'll be lonely.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Stop it. Stop! Okay let's go. We can be strong.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yeah, okay.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh my god! Did you hear that? She said Monica! Oooh, I can't leave her!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: You know if you want, we can sneak the dog back in and Chandler wouldn't even know.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: That's not gonna work.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: I've had that dog there for three days and Chandler had no idea. He's not so smart.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Hey! I didn't know either.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yeah, but you kinda knew that something was going on, didn't you?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Yeah, I knew.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Where's Chandler?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Here I am.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Wash your hands!!!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: How did you…know?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hey! What's she doing back here?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Relax, Ross. She's not made of ice cream!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hey look, Phoebe. I, uh, I laid out the states geographically...

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: No, no, we don't really have time for this right now. Okay, we have to keep Chandler away from my bedroom.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yeah, but, but look what I'm...

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: See, this is exactly what we do not have time for.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Where's Monica?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Um, in Phoebe's room. You can't go in there.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Why not?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Monica's crying. She's very upset about this whole Clunkers thing.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Well, I, I should go in there.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: No. No, no. She doesn't want to see you right now.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Why not?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Because you sent away the dog!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: This is ridiculous.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh, is it? Is it? Look, when Monica and I were kids, we had a dog named Rover. And, uh, one day, my dad decides, he doesn't like dogs. So Monica and her friend…Phyllis…take away the dog. And that was the last time we ever saw him. Don't you see? This is just like that. Only with a few details changed.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Okay, I'm in my sweat pants. Bring on the food! What's the matter?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Monica's all upset, because I sent Clunkers away.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: So? Bring the dog back, you're a hero.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yeah, I can be a hero, I could do that. I could, I could do... I, w-w-what if, what if it attacks me?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Chandler, it's like a big gerbil.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: And that doesn't scare you?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Ross, you need some help?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: From you? Yes, please!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: First of all, Utah? Dude, you can't just make stuff up!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I hate America! When I finish this game, I swear I am moving.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey! Tag's still talking to the police.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yeah, ohh! Why, damnit, why did I open my mouth? I have a crush on you; I am attracted to you. Gee, I-I know that I freaked him out

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: If you said it like that, you probably did, yeah.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Hey, is Chandler here?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: No, no he went for a walk.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Okay, but you cannot tell him... but look whose back!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Hi!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh No-no-no-no-no-no-no! He went over to Ross' to bring the dog back here!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh no, the dog's not going to be there!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: You think?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Hi, honey.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Please, please, please, don't be mad at me.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: What? Why, why would...

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Shh, wait and see. Maybe we will, maybe we won't.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Okay, I went over to Ross' apartment to bring back Clunkers. Y’know, for you, and… I left the door open and she must have gotten out and I looked everywhere, all over the apartment, including the roof, which FYI Ross, one of your neighbors, growing weed. I couldn't find him, and I am so, so, so, sorry. But I do know where we could all go ease the pain.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: We have good news, look whose back!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Hi!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Clunkers?! Oh my god!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: That's right, she came back all by herself.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: It's a Thanksgiving miracle!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: It is so good to see you!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yeah, she came all the way back from Ross' building. Oh, the things she must have seen! And then she climbed up the fire escape and she tapped on the window with her teeny little paw and then we ran to let her in… I went to far, didn't I? When should I have stopped?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Okay, maybe this is so hard, because there aren't 50 states. Let me tell you something, I have 49 states, and there are no more! I-I think, I should be able to eat something.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: It's up to you.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh, hi! How are you doing?

utterance.speaker: Tag
utterance.content: I'm okay. I gotta go down to the police station and look at mug shots.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh.

utterance.speaker: Tag
utterance.content: Thanks for having me over, you guys.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Tag? Y-You're going? Uh we didn't, uh we didn't get the chance to talk. Uh, so, where did you say you're from again?

utterance.speaker: Tag
utterance.content: Colorado.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Ah, what good are you.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Look, um, I think we should talk about what happened on the terrace.

utterance.speaker: Tag
utterance.content: Okay.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Ah, I-I never should have said what I said. It—y’know what? It just doesn't matter how I feel. I mean we work together, so nothing could really ever happen between us, and what I would love is just to go to work on Monday, and-and never talk about this again, okay? Big day Monday lots to do. So, we're okay?

utterance.speaker: Tag
utterance.content: Um, I'm not.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh, god, I know it, that I freaked you out.

utterance.speaker: Tag
utterance.content: No, you didn't. The only thing that freaked me out was you saying that nothing could ever happen between us.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Really?

utterance.speaker: Tag
utterance.content: Yeah, so, please don't fire me for doing this.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Okay, well, that's one less thing we have to do on Monday.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Delaware! Delaware!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: All right.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I want my turkey now!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: You got it. You got Nevada twice.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I know.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yeah.
